comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Stephanie Hampl was a New York nurse who died in 1916 when the Italian steamer Brindisi struck a mine in the Adriatic and sunk (according to The sun., January 19, 1916, Page 2, with photo). See also The New York Times, February 4, 1916

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: Thank you for locating the sad story of Hampl. We will add to the record with more of these details.
